data.message: It's evolution man. You want him to still be raping about vicodin and fag got? He grew up, had more to say. Wtf have YOU done? Have you evolved? Have you grown up? Brah is far from washed up. All brah needs to do is listen to himself. That's when the best stuff comes out. That's when he's King. The off timing on some songs is experimental, and most of the time it works. Some of us are past hearing him blast on Kim or Jennifer dude. Get over it, or listen to something else.... Lemme guess, you're a Kanye fan aren't you..... And sorry brah, I know you respect him, but Kanye blows. Net they never have to give your life away for free Lmao.... Js
